entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Spec] Proposed Keyboard/Mouse Specs for .NET9 #16799
  • Update Blazor Hybrid template to match new Blazor Web App conventions #16797
  • PhoneDialer not working in Windows #16788
  • [WinUI] CollectionView runtime binding errors when loading the ItemSource asynchronously #16787
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Entry pushed under keyboard and off the page iOS #16784
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] CollectionView pushed off the screen iOS & Android #16783
    .NET 8 GA
  • Cannot Build MAUI Blazor Android App when Referencing a Blazor WebAssembly Project #16782
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #16778
  • SetSite failed for package [Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.Implementation.EditorPackage]Source #16775
  • Custom renderers can't work on iOS in .NET MAUI #16774
    .NET 8 + Servicing

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Shell flyout layout is incorrect #15793
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Cannot interact with RadioButton on iOS in a Popup #15760
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CascadeInputTransparent="False" is not working on ContentView #10977
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Spec] Proposed Keyboard/Mouse Specs for .NET8 #12004
    .NET 8 GA
  • Linking of native static library fails and the resulting package is including the native reference #16764
  • Empty MAUI project does not compile: dotnet workload install and restore for android workload fail in microsoft.android.sdk.windows.msi.x64::33.0.80 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json #16657
  • Alt+Tab Causes Search bar via CTRL+F in top of the screen #11285
    Backlog
  • Resizing the window causes rare flickering #16702
  • : WindowsPackageType is set to None, but GenerateAppxPackageOnBuild is set to true. #16696
  • UseMauiEmbedding extension does not use specified TApp #16757
    Under Consideration
  • There are better ways #16780
  • The background color of Entry cannot be switched in the Normal and Focus states. #14600
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Updating Image.Source at runtime is not working for iOS #12020
    Under Consideration
  • Title bar messes up on resize #16209
  • Generating multiple images from a single svg-file #10316
    .NET 8 GA
  • Auto read OTP in Android using the Google SMS Verification API #16773
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6] [Android] SwipeView's data binding doesn't work while using it inside a CollectionView #16742
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6] SwipeView breaks binding #16345
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Revert "Internalize MessagingCenter (#12582)" #16798
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [build] avoid NETSDK1195 error #16795
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Update CollectionView layout when reloading data #16794
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Use the correct WASDK property #16793
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix in templates for .DS_Store on MacOSX causing build failures #16776
    area/templates 📄, Under Consideration

Merged

  • MauiEmbedding extensions should use specified TApp type #16758
    community ✨, backport/suggested, Under Consideration
  • Make ImageSourcePartExtensions public #16633
    area/image :framed_picture:, t/housekeeping ♻︎, i/regression
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Allow "duplicate" files to be processed #16534
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16771
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Streamline SwipeView Children #16753
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • Document IElementHandler #16706
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8 GA
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Don't force the RID to be x64 #16678
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Add a "VSCode" target to open the "maui.code-workspace". #16732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #16762
    area/ListView, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Update VisualElement docs #16754
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
    do-not-merge, area/testing, community ✨
  • Update Windows App SDK #16610
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] Fix Picker PointerOver TextColor (#16751) #16752
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker, Under Consideration
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Document Brush & Colors #16738
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8 GA
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [Housekeeping] Review all the pending TODOs comments related with .NET 8 #16670
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
